title: Tri-Modal Antifungal Catheter Lock (TCL): Open Proof of Invention
description: LaTeX sources, figures, and compiled PDF for the public disclosure of the Tri-Modal Catheter Lock (TCL) addressing Candida auris biofilms. Includes workflow schematics and manufacturing/spec documentation for reproducibility.
notes: Non-commercial research use only. Commercial licensing requests: avalamontes@kapodistrian.edu.gr.
